text: Saioni kumamo'a mago mofakna hu'neankino, vahe'mo'zama eme azama hanagura azana rusute'neanagi, mago vahe'mo'a eno asunkura hunenteno azeri hankavea oti'ne. Ra Anumzamo'a Jekopu nagakura huama huno, Tavaoma'arema nemaniza vahe'mo'za oti'za ha' vahe'a fore hugahaze huno hu'neankino, ha' vahe'mo'zama Jerusalemi kuma'ma kazana, agru osu zankna hu'nege'za ke'naze.
